data.Name: Greenwave
data.Tagline: We are Ocean Farmers creating jobs and protecting the planet
data.About:
GreenWave supports a new generation of ocean farmers feeding the planet and building a blue-green economy in the era of climate change.

GreenWaveâ€™s strategy for scale is to seed "GreenWave Reefs" in new regions. Each Reef is composed of 50 regenerative ocean farms, clustered around a processing hub and a land-based hatchery, surrounded by a ring of institutional buyers and entrepreneurs.

Our goal is to plant 1 million acres of seaweed and shellfish in the next 10 years.
